lead_paragraph: Lleyton Hewitt has selected doubles specialist John Peers as a reinforcement for Nick Kyrgios, Bernard Tomic and Sam Groth on Australia's team for the Davis Cup match against the United States on grass at Kooyong next month.

headline.print_headline: Hewitt Picks Tomic, Kyrgios to Play vs US in Davis Cup
headline.main: Hewitt Picks Tomic, Kyrgios to Play vs US in Davis Cup

snippet: Lleyton Hewitt has selected doubles specialist John Peers as a reinforcement for Nick Kyrgios, Bernard Tomic and Sam Groth on Australia's team for the Davis Cup match against the United States on grass at Kooyong next month....
